head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DONOHUE, JOSEPH F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DONOHUE, JOSEPH F.

block.p: DONOHUE-Joseph F. Of Montclair, formerly of Nutley, on March 19, 1997. Beloved husband of Catherine (Feeney), father of Patricia A. Chrichton, Joseph F. Jr., John P., Robert E., Paul F., and Catherine M.; brother of Charles F., Edgar A., Vincent J., Louise Burke and Mary Carson; also survived by eight grandchildren and four great-grandchildren. Funeral from the Hugh M. Moriarty Funeral Home, 76 Park Street, Montclair, NJ, today at 9 AM, then to Immaculate Conception Church, Montclair, where at 10:30 AM, a Mass of Christian Burial will be offered. In lieu of flowers, donations to the Immaculate Conception Building Fund, 30 North Fullerton Avenue, Montclair, NJ 07042, or to the charity of your choice.
